value:
Something in the air of this world
seems familiar to me. Perhaps it is
only the celebration.

Empress Sanaki is like a ray of
sunlight. Such warmth is necessary
during a wintertime celebration.

I have walked across all the lands
of Tellius, and I must admit that
Askr's festivals are second to none.

There are more presents to deliver
than I had anticipated. I suppose
I have no choice... I'll need a helper.

The scale of the decorations is
simply marvelous.

I am...a pilgrim. My name is Sephiran.
I come bearing wintertime gifts from
$Nf's castle.

From the depths of my heart, I thank
you, for this is not the result of my
efforts alone.

I wonder... Am I living up to what
everyone expects of me?

I do not fit this role well... It must
be that the goddess sees through
to the truth.

Your selection is praiseworthy.
This should make for an exciting
festival indeed.

I am...a pilgrim. My name is Sephiran.
What a cheerful celebration. I am glad
to play my part.

Ah, hello. You've timed our meeting
perfectly. I've just finished handing
out the gifts.$k$pIt warmed my heart seeing everyone
come together to celebrate the winter
festival with one another.$k$pIn Askr, it isn't just the royals and the
commonfolk, there's the beorc and
laguz too...$k$pThe two peoples have overcome their
differences in order to build a better
future, side by side.$k$pIf I had known such a thing were
possible... How different my choices
would have been...$k$pAh. Do forgive me. I've begun to
babble, I fear. As I was saying...$k$pThere is a lot one can learn from
the people of Askr. For summoning
me here, I cannot thank you enough.
Haah!
A waste.
Hrrgh...
I can't avoid it...
A sacred night.
Take this gift.
Will you struggle?
Just for you...
I take my leave...
Ha ha...
Are you injured?
Let's fix you up.
Today, I don the attire of the winter festival. Does it suit me?
This is a gift for Lady Sanaki. I know her well.
The amassing snow gently conceals all sadness... That's the sort of celebration this is.
If I'd have known a future like this would come... What could I have done?
So these happy moments are your gifts. I shall treasure them.
Let's be off.
Worrisome.
Breathtaking.
